name: voby
description: A wannabe high-performance framework for writing web apps.

scripts.dev:benchmark: cd demo/benchmark && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.prod:benchmark: cd demo/benchmark && npm i && npm run prod
scripts.dev:counter: cd demo/counter && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.prod:counter: cd demo/counter && npm i && npm run prod
scripts.dev:playground: cd demo/playground && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.prod:playground: cd demo/playground && npm i && npm run prod
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run compile
